;On December 4, President Xi Jinping was in Beijing Diaoyutai State Guesthouse met with Belarusian President Lukashenko.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Huang Jingwen

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 4  ; (Reporter Sun Yi) On December 4, President Xi Jinping met with President Lukashenko of Belarus at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that at the end of February this year, Mr. President successfully paid a state visit to China, and we reached an important consensus on promoting the high-level development of China-Belarus relations. Over the past year, political mutual trust between the two countries has been further consolidated, and international cooperation has become closer. China has always viewed China-Belarus relations from a strategic and long-term perspective, firmly supports Belarus in taking a development path that is in line with its national conditions, and opposes external forces interfering in Belarus' internal affairs. China is willing to continue to strengthen strategic coordination with Belarus, firmly support each other, promote practical cooperation, and continue to deepen China-Belarus relations.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that ten years ago I proposed the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" initiative, and now more than 150 countries have participated in cooperation. Not long ago, I proposed eight actions for China to support high-quality joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and welcome Belarus to continue to actively participate in it and obtain more tangible development opportunities. Both sides should implement projects such as the China-Belarus Industrial Park and promote China-Belarus industrial cooperation to achieve more results. Both sides should improve cross-border transportation facilitation and promote economic, trade and personnel exchanges. Regularly hold cultural day activities in each other's country, expand cooperation in education, health, sports and tourism, support the youth of the two countries in exchanges and cooperation, and enhance mutual understanding and friendship between the two peoples. China and Belarus are important forces participating in the reform and construction of the global governance system. China is willing to work with Belarus to strengthen coordination and cooperation within multilateral mechanisms such as the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, promote the implementation of global development initiatives, global security initiatives, and global civilization initiatives, and promote the building of a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Lukashenko said that under the leadership of President Xi Jinping, China has made great achievements in development. More than 1.4 billion Chinese people live a happy life and have made important contributions to the world. President Xi Jinping’s successful experience in governing the country has benefited all parties and is worth learning from. Belarus sincerely hopes that China will continue to develop and become stronger, which will be conducive to the cause of peace and progress around the world. Belarus will unswervingly develop friendly relations with China and is willing to intensify high-level exchanges with China, firmly support each other, deepen mutually beneficial cooperation, strengthen international and multilateral strategic coordination, and promote greater development of the Belarus-China all-weather comprehensive strategic partnership. Belarus firmly believes that the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and other global initiatives proposed by President Xi Jinping are great undertakings that truly build consensus and cooperation in the international community, and will continue to actively participate in them.

;

;The two heads of state also exchanged views on the Ukrainian crisis and other issues.

;

;Cai Qi and Wang Yi attended the meeting.

;■ The Constitution is the general charter for governing the country and ensuring national security. It is the fundamental legal basis for our party’s governance and administration. The highest legal norm for political and social life. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the party has strengthened its overall leadership over constitutional work, enriched and developed socialist constitutional theory and practice with Chinese characteristics, and promoted the construction of our country's constitutional system and the implementation of the constitution to achieve historic achievements

;

;■  On the new journey, we must firmly safeguard the authority and dignity of the Constitution, promote the improvement and development of the Constitution, better play the important role of the Constitution in governing the country, and provide a solid guarantee for comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization. ;

; The General Charter for the Governance of the Country and Security of the State is the fundamental legal basis for our party’s governance of the country and the highest legal norm for national political and social life. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the party has strengthened its overall leadership over constitutional work, enriched and developed socialist constitutional theory and practice with Chinese characteristics, and promoted the construction of my country's constitutional system and the implementation of the constitution to achieve historic achievements.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that on the new journey, we must firmly safeguard the authority and dignity of the Constitution, promote the improvement and development of the Constitution, better play the important role of the Constitution in governance, and comprehensively promote the construction of a strong country with Chinese-style modernization. , provide a solid guarantee for the great cause of national rejuvenation. We must strengthen our confidence in the political system, uphold the leadership position of the Communist Party of China as determined by the Constitution, and uphold the state system of the people's democratic dictatorship and the People's Congress system as determined by the Constitution. It is necessary to implement the socialist rule of law with Chinese characteristics in the new era, adhere to the comprehensive implementation of the provisions of the Constitution, the principles of the Constitution, and the spirit of the Constitution, adhere to the implementation of the Constitution, the interpretation of the Constitution, and the advancement of the system of constitutional supervision, accelerate the improvement of the socialist legal system with Chinese characteristics with the Constitution as the core, and continuously Improve the level of implementation and supervision of the Constitution. It is necessary to strengthen theoretical research and publicity and education on the Constitution, persist in the popularization of knowledge, theoretical interpretation, and conceptual guidance, vigorously promote the spirit of the Constitution and the spirit of socialist rule of law throughout society, and promote the implementation of the Constitution as a conscious action of all people.

;

;On the 4th, the General Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, together with the Central Propaganda Department and the Ministry of Justice, held a symposium in Beijing on "Carrying forward the spirit of the Constitution, strengthening the implementation of the Constitution, and providing constitutional guarantees for building a strong country and national rejuvenation." Important instructions from Xi Jinping were conveyed at the meeting. Zhao Leji, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, attended the symposium and delivered a speech.

;

;In his speech, Zhao Leji emphasized that we must adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, study and implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions, comprehensively promote the implementation of the Constitution and publicity and education, and give full play to the power of the country’s fundamental law. Advantages and effectiveness.

;

;Zhao Leji pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has issued a series of important speeches and articles on the Constitution and its implementation, and made a series of important instructions, which have enriched and developed the theory of socialist constitution with Chinese characteristics. It provides fundamental compliance and action guidelines for writing a new chapter in China's constitutional practice in the new era. We must deeply understand that upholding the leadership of the Communist Party of China is the most prominent feature and most fundamental requirement of our country’s Constitution, deeply understand the decisive significance of the “two establishments”, achieve “two maintenances”, and ensure the comprehensive, systematic and overall implementation of the party’s leadership to the entire process of all aspects of the party and state’s undertakings. We must deeply understand that our country's Constitution is a constitution with a distinct socialist nature and a people's constitution in the true sense, firmly grasp the essential requirements of Chinese-style modernization, use the Constitution to build consensus and gather the strength of unity and struggle. We must deeply understand that our country's Constitution has the supreme legal status and strong legal power. The comprehensive implementation of the Constitution is the primary task of comprehensively governing the country according to law, and comprehensively building a modern socialist country on the track of the rule of law.

;

;Zhao Leji emphasized that on the new journey, we must thoroughly study and implement the theory of the socialist constitution with Chinese characteristics and continue to deepen the comprehensive implementation of the constitution. It is necessary to improve the socialist legal system with Chinese characteristics, improve the implementation mechanism of relevant provisions of the Constitution, improve the constitutional supervision system, and ensure the implementation of the Constitution with a scientific, effective, systematic and complete system. It is necessary to tell the story of the Chinese Constitution well, carry forward the spirit of the Constitution, strengthen theoretical research on the Constitution, and make all people loyal advocates, conscious adherents, and staunch defenders of the Constitution.

;

;Li Hongzhong, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and vice chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, chaired the symposium.

;

;Relevant responsible comrades from the Central Propaganda Department, the Constitution and Law Committee of the National People's Congress, the Ministry of Justice, the Supreme People's Court, the Supreme People's Procuratorate, the Ministry of Education, the China Law Society and representatives of the National People's Congress spoke at the symposium.

;

;Xiao Jie, Hao Mingjin and Zhang Qingwei attended the symposium.

;

;Responsible comrades of the special committees of the National People's Congress and the Working Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, responsible comrades of relevant departments of the central and state agencies, and experts and scholars from some universities and scientific research institutes in Beijing attended the symposium.

; Tue, 05 Dec 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 努力创造令世界刮目相看的新奇迹http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231205_5-01.htm
;Tuesday, December 05, 2023
; ;

;The Yangtze River is like a giant dragon flying towards the vast sea, and Shanghai is like a high-spirited dragon head, rising unstoppably and bravely into the sky forward. This is an image depiction of Shanghai’s geographical location and a vivid portrayal of its economic status.

;

;In late November and early December, General Secretary Xi Jinping came to Shanghai for inspection. When he came this time, he pretended to further promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta, a grand strategy related to China's overall development; he pretended to speed up the construction of "five centers", an important mission assigned to Shanghai by the Party Central Committee; he cared about the people's pursuit of a better future. The big things and small things in life.

;

;The General Secretary has been inspecting the Shanghai Futures Exchange, the Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Achievements Exhibition, the Minhang District New Era City Builders and Managers’ Home, or presiding over a symposium on in-depth promotion of the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta. Yes, everything I read, asked, thought about, and talked about never left these topics.

;

;;The mission is like a torch;

;

;“Building Shanghai into the ‘Five Centers’ is a decision made by the Party Central Committee to comprehensively assess the domestic and international situation and coordinate the overall situation of reform and development. The major decision-making is an important mission entrusted to Shanghai by the Party Central Committee." General Secretary Xi Jinping is far-sighted.

;

;From the 14th National Congress of the Communist Party of China in October 1992, it was proposed to build Shanghai into "one leader and three centers", and later "four centers", to General Secretary Xi Jinping's inspection in Shanghai in May 2014. At that time, the overall framework for the construction of the "Five Centers" was clearly proposed. At the end of 2017, the state clarified the functional positioning of Shanghai's "Five Centers". In October 2023, the Standing Committee meeting of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee reviewed and approved the "On Supporting Shanghai to Accelerate the "Five Centers" "Opinions on Construction". The formation of this major decision has gone through a process of continuous expansion and deepening.

;

;This process is also a process in which Shanghai continues to assume more, larger and heavier missions in the overall development of the country. Because of this, Comrade Xi Jinping pointed out when he was working in Shanghai: “We must place Shanghai’s future development in the central government’s strategic positioning of Shanghai’s development, in the general trend of economic globalization, and in the overall development pattern of the country. Think and plan within the country’s overall deployment of the Yangtze River Delta regional development.”

;

;Only with a broad vision can we have a big pattern, and with a big pattern can we achieve great achievements. The general secretary’s words fully demonstrated the high position and ambitious pursuit of the strategic plan for the construction of “five centers”.

;

;In the construction of Shanghai’s “Five Centers”, Pudong is the forefront. In March 2007, just one week into his tenure as Shanghai Municipal Party Committee Secretary, Comrade Xi Jinping launched a comprehensive survey of 19 districts and counties, and the first stop was Pudong. This time, General Secretary Xi Jinping visited Shanghai for inspection, and his first stop was Pudong.

;

;The changes in Pudong have been earth-shaking. The "Slush Crossing Road" is gone, and what comes into view is the bustling business district, dense financial institutions, numerous R&D buildings, and shuttles and ships... This place is like a strong pulsating heart, continuously transporting goods to all directions. With financial blood and development momentum.

;

;At the Shanghai Futures Exchange, the General Secretary walked into the futures trading hall. The red and green data on the screen beat the "Shanghai Price" that guides the investment transactions of thousands of upstream and downstream companies.

;

;On the booth of listed deliverables, crude oil, paper pulp, rubber, copper, aluminum, nickel... This exchange is still a "post-90s". It has only been established for more than 20 years, but it has achieved remarkable results and the scale of transactions It has been at the forefront of the world for many years and has become the third largest futures trading market in the world.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping’s eyes fell on rubber.

;

;Domestic rubber resources were once very scarce, and there was a saying that "a grain of rubber breeds a tael of gold". Today, my country has become one of the major rubber producing countries in the world, and the "Shanghai Rubber" global pricing center is accelerating. The General Secretary was quite emotional after hearing this: Behind every futures product there is an industry support, and the rapid development of the Shanghai Futures Exchange is inseparable from the growing national strength of China.

;

;The General Secretary has been concerned about the construction and development of Shanghai International Shipping Center for many years. Hearing that Container Shipping Index (European Line) futures were launched in August this year, becoming my country's first service-type and cash-delivered futures product, the General Secretary expressed his affirmation.

;

;The past is like a flood. General Secretary Xi Jinping’s thoughts go back to 16 years ago. He told everyone: "When I was working in Shanghai, I took a day to visit several financial institutions, including the Shanghai Futures Exchange. At that time, futures were still in the exploratory stage, but now they have become important in Asia and internationally. We Therefore, we can see that Shanghai’s goal of building an international financial center is correct, the pace is steady, and the future is bright. We must continue to work hard.”

;

;The General Secretary always keeps scientific and technological innovation in mind. After leaving the Shanghai Futures Exchange, he came to Zhangjiang Science City to visit the Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Achievements Exhibition. Blue Sky Dream, innovative drugs, smart manufacturing, future cars... it's dizzying and exciting.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping carefully inspected each booth and stopped in front of the intelligent robot. He watched with great interest as a robot "showed off" its flexible "fingers" and "walked" over with steady steps. "What is the international level of this technology?" "From a practical point of view, has it been deployed?" The questions were detailed and thoughtful.

;

;After watching the exhibition, the General Secretary said with emotion: "These scientific and technological innovation achievements achieved in Shanghai make me feel very at ease, with greater confidence and confidence."

;

;From importing even a single screw to a major country using heavy weapons to demonstrate its confidence, after decades of hard work, my country's science and technology industry has undergone historic, overall, and pattern changes. In the exhibition hall, representatives of scientific researchers from all walks of life gathered together. The general secretary said sincerely: "Promoting Chinese-style modernization cannot be separated from the strategic support of science and technology, education, and talents. Shanghai must be a good leader in this regard and accelerate its progress towards a scientific and technological innovation center with global influence."

;< p>;From the "two bombs and one satellite" back then to today's scientific research field, we have achieved fruitful results and talented people have emerged from generation to generation. The General Secretary recalled the past: "We must strive to cultivate a large number of cutting-edge talents with a sense of mission and create good conditions for them to display their talents."

;

;Writing the glorious chapter of the "Five Centers" construction requires a pen of Lingyun. "To give full play to the leading and exemplary role in promoting Chinese-style modernization" is General Secretary Xi Jinping's new expectation for Shanghai, and it has also become the new functional positioning of Shanghai's "five centers". With the acceleration of the construction of the "Five Centers", Shanghai, the "Pearl of the Orient", will surely shine even brighter.

;

;;The original intention is as solid as rock;

;

;Shanghai is the birthplace of our party.

;

;Not long after the conclusion of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping led members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee to visit the site of the National Congress of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai and review the dream of our party. He meditated in front of the words "The beginning is simple, the end is huge", sighed in front of a "Current Situation Map" in the late Qing Dynasty, and reviewed the oath of joining the party in front of the huge party flag.

;

;A century of changes and changes. Times are changing, but the original intention remains the same.

;

;In the past, Shanghai was plagued by the “big city disease” of dense buildings, dense population, crowded houses, narrow roads, and little greening. When he was working in Shanghai, Comrade Xi Jinping was worried about the housing difficulties of citizens. On weekends, he often goes to the old community to walk around, wander around, and think about how to solve the "old and difficult" problems.

;

;After the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the General Secretary first proposed the concept of "people's cities built by the people and people's cities for the people" in Shanghai.

;

;This time, General Secretary Xi Jinping made a special trip to Minhang District, which has a high proportion of migrant population, to take a look at the Home of Urban Builders and Managers in the New Era. Shanghai has made steady and rapid progress in increasing the financing and construction of affordable rental housing. At present, the city has completed a total of 316,000 units (rooms), and it is getting closer and closer to the goal of raising 470,000 units (rooms) for new construction planned during the "14th Five-Year Plan" period.

;

;The sun is warm. The general secretary walked into the rental community.

;

;After graduating from university, Zheng Lanyu worked in Shanghai for more than two years and rented a two-bedroom apartment here. She and her mother enthusiastically welcomed the General Secretary into their new rented home.

;

;“Is the rent expensive?” “It’s not expensive, and it’s very comfortable to live in.” She opened the window to see the view, and the room was very warmly decorated. Zheng Lanyu smiled brightly, “Thank you to the party and the government for allowing me to live in Shanghai. We have a home.”

;

;The multi-level rental housing supply system of “one bed, one room, one suite” is allowing more “new Shanghainese” to realize their “dream of living in peace”.

;

;The other building is a dormitory-type rental house. General Secretary Xi Jinping walked into a double room.

;

;Two caregivers from a nursing home live here. Desks, refrigerators, washing machines, induction cookers and other living facilities are all available. Tenant Qian Lili has been in Shanghai for more than ten years and was once worried about the difficulty and high price of renting a house. Today, she said happily: "The rent here is cheap, the hot water in the bathroom is available 24 hours a day, and the commute to and from get off work only takes about ten minutes. We are very satisfied."

;

;There is a four-person room next door. The tenants are all security guards from nearby property companies. They opened up the conversation to the General Secretary: "There are public kitchens, laundry rooms, bathrooms, and reception rooms here. There are badminton courts and basketball courts outside. It's great, great!"

;

;"Next step What are your plans?" the general secretary asked kindly.

;

;Su Yuanbao from Linyi, Shandong said: "If it develops further, I will take over my wife and children and rent a one-bedroom apartment here." Wu Tao from Suzhou, Anhui said: "I want to get a certificate. Find a girlfriend and settle down here."

;

;"Okay! Take root, settle down, and develop." The general secretary said with a smile, "You are also the builders and contributors of Shanghai, so Shanghai I also want to care about you."

;

;When he was about to leave, the community residents gathered around him to say goodbye.

;

;"When I was working in Shanghai, I came to Minhang for a day of investigation. This time I came to Minhang and saw that the whole look was completely new." General Secretary Xi Jinping said seriously, "A city must not only have height, but also There must be warmth. Our socialism is to take the path of common prosperity. Migrant workers who come to Shanghai to contribute are also the masters of the city. We must practice the people's city concept and continuously meet the people's diverse and diversified needs for housing. , to ensure that foreign residents can come in, stay, live in peace, and become successful."

;

;A city is a city for the people. The People's City is built by the people, and the People's City is for the people.

;

;The warmth of a city is accumulated in construction without abandoning the smallest details, and is protected by development day and night. Indoors and outdoors, Shanghai maneuvers in a compact space and strives to provide more public areas for the people. In this city, parks have accelerated their “growth”, increasing from 243 to 670 in 5 years. The general secretary profoundly pointed out: "To build and govern a megacity like Shanghai well, we must have a big pattern and big ideas, as well as refined thinking and 'embroidery' skills."

;

;What the people want , the direction of politics.

;

;In the process of promoting Chinese-style modernization, General Secretary Xi Jinping has always looked towards the people: "The core essence of building a socialist modern international metropolis with world influence is 'socialist modernization'", Urban construction “must reflect the distinctive characteristics of socialist modernization and the essential attributes of a people’s city.”

;

;;The layout is like chess;

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping has attached great importance to the Yangtze River Delta for a long time.

;

;When he was working in Zhejiang, he actively worked hard to promote the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta; when he was working in Shanghai, he took the initiative to shoulder the leading role; after working in the central government, he promoted the integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta to the level of National strategy. Since then, the General Secretary presided over two symposiums with the theme of integrated development of the Yangtze River Delta in August 2020 and this time.

;

;

;

"Protect joint governance" and "strive to improve security development capabilities."
